amendment.description: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to transfer funds from Health and Human Services General Department Management to the Small Rural Hospital Improvement Grant Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
